jobs.title: Frontend Developer Intern
jobs.description: We are looking for a passionate Frontend Developer Intern to join our team. You will be working on exciting projects using React and modern web technologies.
requirements: Knowledge of React, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS
Familiarity with version control systems like Git
responsibilities: Develop and maintain responsive web applications
Collaborate with the design team to implement UI/UX designs
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Participate in code reviews and team discussions

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: DataSystems is seeking a Backend Engineer to help build scalable and efficient server-side applications.
requirements: Knowledge of MongoDB or other NoSQL databases
responsibilities: Ensure high performance and responsiveness of applications

jobs.title: UI/UX Design Intern
jobs.description: Join our creative team as a UI/UX Design Intern and help create beautiful and functional user interfaces.
requirements: Knowledge of design tools like Figma or Adobe XD
Creative mindset and attention to detail
Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS is a plus
responsibilities: Collaborate with developers to implement designs
Conduct user research and usability testing
